output: html_document
---

```{r}
nakba_lda <- nakba_regio_tidy |> 
  select(-c(month, day, outlet, year_pub, regional, ueberregional, sonstiges, id))


toks <- tokens(nakba_id, remove_punct = TRUE, remove_symbols = TRUE, 
               remove_numbers = TRUE, remove_url = TRUE)
dfmt <- dfm(toks) |> 
    dfm_remove(stopwords("en")) |>
    dfm_remove("*@*") |>
    dfm_trim(max_docfreq = 0.1, docfreq_type = "prop")
print(dfmt)
```
